price: ሁሉንም ጌታህ ሥራዎቻቸውን (ምንዳቸውን) በእርግጥ ይሞላላቸዋል፡፡ እርሱ በሚሠሩት ሁሉ ውስጠ ዐዋቂ ነውና፡፡
arabic: وَإِنَّ كُلّٗا لَّمَّا لَيُوَفِّيَنَّهُمۡ رَبُّكَ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡۚ إِنَّهُۥ بِمَا يَعۡمَلُونَ خَبِيرٞ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-inna kullan lammā layuwaffiyannahum rabbuka aʿmālahum innahu bimā yaʿmalūna khabīrun
translations: surely will pay them in full
